I see that Junit 4.1 has a new method for comparing arrays.  However
in my =
case the arrays are created via reflection. So the arrays are
declared as O=
bject and the Object version of assertEquals does not
examine the array ele=
ments.  I suggested on the Junit issue tracker
that the Object version of a=
ssertEquals be ammended to check if the
two Objects are both arrays then ac=
t like the array version.

I am posting this here to see what other discuss=
ion this might generate.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,
Dav=
